name: Business Link
overview:
Businesslink.gov.uk helps your business save time and money by giving you instant access to clear, simple, and trustworthy information.

It is developed in partnership with subject experts within government and relevant business-support organisations to help you comply with regulations and improve your performance.

You can manage your personal list of starting-up tasks with our Business Start-up Organiser to create a personalised list of tasks to assist you when setting up your business. Or Search our business support finder for grants, loans, expertise and advice for which your business may be eligible to pinpoint potential sources of help.

If you’re already up and running, you can file your VAT and PAYE (Pay As You Earn) returns from our Do it online area.

The interactive tools can take you step-by-step through various key business activities. You can use our interactive tool to create a written statement of employment or use our interactive tool to assess how well your business is performing.

There are also over 1,300 guides offering practical advice for businesses in all aspects of business.

offices.address1: Business Link Northwest Brian Johnson Way
